accident, disaster, emergency, and/or threat. It involves risk mitigation planning (reducing possibility of the occurrence of adverse events), and business recovery planning (ensuring continued operation in the aftermath of a disaster).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Consequently, a disaster recovery plan is a documented process or set of the procedures to recover and protect business IT infrastructure in the event of a disaster. This plan, usually documented, specifies procedures the organization is to follow in the event of a disaster. It is a comprehensive statement of consistent actions to be taken before, during and after a disaster.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Business Continuity Plans (BCPs) and Disaster Recovery Plans (DRPs) are developed and maintained for every business unit taking into account the local specifics of business unit assets.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM establishes, documents, implements and maintains processes, procedures and controls to ensure the required level of continuity for information security during an adverse situation as a part of appropriate BCPs and DRPs.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why is QMS important for you? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Owing to adherence to QMS, your work in the Company and in a project is performed according to the requirements known in advance. You can easily adapt yourself regardless the project you are involved in.\\nDocumented processes, guidelines and instructions allow solving issues using accumulated experience of the other teams. Project documentation helps to avoid keeping large amount of information in mind and to find necessary things rather quickly. You can fulfill project tasks, solve arising problems and plan your activity much easier; level of misunderstanding and probability of miscommunication in a project and with the Customer decreases significantly, improving emotional atmosphere in the team and job satisfaction.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Successful functioning of ISMS is important to protect information
